name: RoCateer
description:
Rocateer is a very simple game prototype from the Game Dev TV Unity 3D course, I added an avatar instead of the rocket, model and animation made on Blender 2.8 by myself.

Only 7 levels, just the core game design.

Controls:

Space Bar - Thrust

"A" and "D" rotation

Objective: Land on the green pad without hitting anything else.
